issue.title: V30.1 Release URL Does Not Exist
issue.body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [x] I have searched the existing issues

### Current behaviour

https://bitcoincore.org/bin/bitcoin-core-30.1/ URL is invalid.

Homebrew update on Mac fails:

âœ˜ Cask bitcoin-core (30.1)
Error: Download failed on Cask 'bitcoin-core' with message: Download failed: https://bitcoincore.org/bin/bitcoin-core-30.1/bitcoin-30.1-arm64-apple-darwin.zip
==> Upgrading 1 outdated package:
bitcoin-core 30.0 -> 30.1
==> Upgrading bitcoin-core
==> Purging files for version 30.1 of Cask bitcoin-core
Error: bitcoin-core: Download failed on Cask 'bitcoin-core' with message: Download failed: https://bitcoincore.org/bin/bitcoin-core-30.1/bitcoin-30.1-arm64-apple-darwin.zip

### Expected behaviour

Homebrew update for bitcoin-core should succeed.

### Steps to reproduce

Just run:

brew update; brew upgrade

### Relevant log output

_No response_

### How did you obtain Bitcoin Core

Pre-built binaries

### What version of Bitcoin Core are you using?

V30.0

### Operating system and version

MacOS Tahoe 26.1

### Machine specifications

_No response_
